titles.title: To designate the United States post office located at 125 West South Street, Indianapolis, Indiana, as the "Andrew Jacobs, Jr., United States Post Office".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight.

bill.summary: 9/26/1996--Introduced. Designates the U.S. Post Office located at 125 West South Street, Indianapolis, Indiana, as the Andrew Jacobs, Jr., United States Post Office.
